body:
Mages specified:  Vel’Koz, Zyra, Malzahar, Vladimir, Brand, Cassiopeia

I thought Vel'Koz was on the list for minor changes, what happened to put him in line for moderate changes instead? 

I would really hate to see his kit changed, its simple yes, but not every kit needs a paragraph explaining ability functions.

replies.body: He was always in the big six. They said he'd be one of the smaller ones among the six but he's still there. No change in scale.
